Shape

Class Star

  • java.lang.Object
    • Shape.Shape
      • Shape.Circle
        • Shape.RegularPolygon
          • Shape.Star
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observable

    public class Star
extends RegularPolygon
    Represents a star. Creates a star out of an inner radius and the other parameters of the super classes. It extends the regular polygon class.
    See Also:
    RegularPolygon, Circle

    • Constructor Detail

      • Star

        public Star()
        Default constructor. Creates a star with default inner radius of 10.

        Constructor with available parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the shape
        colour - colour of the shape in RGBColour format
        centerCoord - anchor coordinate
        radius - radius in double
        edgeAmount - edgeAmount in int
        innerRadius - inner radius in double
